nodes.text: Junarian vases were valuable, ornate items found among the galaxy's Core Worlds. Gorga the Hutt once hired Han Solo and Chewbacca to smuggle a Junarian vase off of Chandrila. Alinka Aloo, a wealthy resident of Coruscant, had three Junarian vases in her tower.
Junarian vases first appeared in the canon junior novel The Mighty Chewbacca in the Forest of Fear!, which was written by Tom Angleberger and published in 2018.
